description:
Based in Mission Hills, California, Larson, Larson, & Dauer has over 40 years of winning cases and more than half a billion dollars for our clients. We provide exceptional advocacy and support for all types of workers' compensation, employment law and personal injury claims.

Our law firm combines experienced representation along with a fresh approach to the law. While focusing specifically upon workers' compensation, employment and personal injury law, we are adept at helping our injured clients find solutions to their legal issues and compensation to help make them whole.

Committed to providing the highest level of service and support possible, we limit the number of cases we handle at any given time to ensure that we can give our full attention to our clients. During our initial consultation, we will analyze your claim and decide upon the best course of action to help make you whole. If we do not feel that we that we can effectively represent you, we will refer you to somebody that can.

To find out more about how Larson, Larson, & Dauer can best help you during your difficult and uncertain time, you can call our law office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation. Our main office is located in Mission Hills, California, but we also have offices in Northern Los Angeles and Ventura County.
